title: Crashing at loading screen almost immediately, comes up with bug splat 100% of time
body:
Whenever the loading screen is meant to come up after the League of Legends logo, my screen goes black for a few seconds as is normal for when the loading screen is about to appear and then it bug splats to the client saying the game has crashed and to reconnect. I tried to change my port settings, I resetted my IP, powercycled my modem, deleted any Logitech software on my computer, restarted my computer. However none of the options worked. I have also pinged riotgames.com and of the 4 packets sent, I had a 100% packet loss. On the debug text files under rads/solutions.. to the file with the text documents, every time I crash it creates a report saying:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
League of Legends caused ACCESS_VIOLATION in module League of Legends

Read from location 00000000 caused an access violation.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please advise on what steps I should take next, thank you!

replies.body: Have you updated your graphics drivers recently?
No I have not, however the game worked fine a few hours prior to when this problem started surfacing at a 100% rate.

Well, you should probably update your drivers then to see if it'll fix it. Riot always presume that you have the latest drivers, and thus make their software to accommodate for that.

If that doesn't work, get back to me and tell me your computer specs, as well as graphics card details and OS.
